mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNBBSMASTER (BBS_ID, BBS_TY_CODE, BBS_ATTRB_CODE, BBS_NM, BBS_INTRCN, REPLY_POSBL_AT, FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT, ATCH_POSBL_FILE_NUMBER, ATCH_POSBL_FILE_SIZE, TMPLAT_ID, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #{bbsId}, #{bbsTyCode}, #{bbsAttrbCode}, #{bbsNm}, #{bbsIntrcn}, #{replyPosblAt}, #{fileAtchPosblAt}, #{posblAtchFileNumber}::integer, #{posblAtchFileSize}::integer, #{tmplatId}, #{useAt}, #{frstRegisterId}, NOW()::timestamp(0) )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(a.BBS_ID) FROM LETTNBBSMASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM009' AND USE_AT='Y') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND a.USE_AT = #{useAt}
AND a.BBS_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND b.CODE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'

SELECT a.BBS_ID, a.BBS_TY_CODE, b.CODE_NM as BBS_TY_CODE_NM, a.BBS_INTRCN, a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE, c.CODE_NM as BBS_ATTRB_CODE_NM, a.BBS_NM, a.TMPLAT_ID, d.TMPLAT_NM, d.TMPLAT_COURS, a.FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT, a.ATCH_POSBL_FILE_NUMBER, a.ATCH_POSBL_FILE_SIZE, a.REPLY_POSBL_AT, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, e.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM, a.USE_AT, to_char(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,(SELECT COALESCE(USE_AT,'N') FROM LETTNBBSUSE WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND TRGET_ID IN (#{uniqId}, 'SYSTEM_DEFAULT_BOARD') ) as AUTH_FLAG FROM LETTNBBSMASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM009' AND USE_AT='Y') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNTMPLATINFO d ON a.TMPLAT_ID = d.TMPLAT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER e ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = e.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #{bbsId}
mapper.update: UPDATE LETTNBBSMASTER SET BBS_NM = #{bbsNm}, BBS_INTRCN = #{bbsIntrcn}, FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT = #{fileAtchPosblAt}, ATCH_POSBL_FILE_NUMBER = #{posblAtchFileNumber}::integer, ATCH_POSBL_FILE_SIZE = #{posblAtchFileSize}::integer, TMPLAT_ID = #{tmplatId}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = NOW()::timestamp(0) WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId}
UPDATE LETTNBBSMASTER SET USE_AT = 'N', LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = NOW()::timestamp(0) WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId}
mapper.select: SELECT BBS_ID, BBS_TY_CODE, BBS_ATTRB_CODE, BBS_NM, TMPLAT_ID FROM LETTNBBSMASTER WHERE USE_AT = 'Y'

SELECT a.BBS_ID, a.BBS_TY_CODE, a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE, a.BBS_NM, a.TMPLAT_ID FROM LETTNBBSMASTER a, LETTNBBSUSE b WHERE a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID AND b.TRGET_ID = #{trgetId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND b.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY a.BBS_ID

SELECT a.BBS_ID, a.BBS_TY_CODE, b.CODE_NM as BBS_TY_CODE_NM, a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE, c.CODE_NM as BBS_ATTRB_CODE_NM, a.BBS_NM, a.TMPLAT_ID, a.USE_AT, to_char(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM LETTNBBSMASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM009' AND USE_AT='Y') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE WHERE a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND a.BBS_ID NOT IN (SELECT BBS_ID FROM LETTNBBSUSE WHERE USE_AT = 'Y')
AND a.BBS_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND b.CODE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(a.BBS_ID) FROM LETTNBBSMASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM009' AND USE_AT='Y') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE WHERE a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND a.BBS_ID NOT IN (SELECT BBS_ID FROM LETTNBBSUSE WHERE USE_AT = 'Y')
AND a.BBS_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND b.CODE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
